A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: director and screenwriter rian johnson shows in the first rey and luke scene what he intended with the last jedi and the star wars legacy: mock it and throw it away. jj abrams left a very nice blank page so johnson could wirte a memorable second act for the fianl piece of the saga. instead\, he wrote poor characters\, bad plots e obliterated the past characters and plots turning this movie into a pathetic mess. subplots that accomplish nothing\, old characters forgotten\, new characters added for no reason at all. too many childish puns and jokes\, diminishing heroes and villains alike. johnson wanted to be george miller\, wanted fury road\, made babe.
